meta.description: Determine the number of brownies and lemon squares to make in order to minimize the total amount of fiber needed, subject to ingredient constraints and product mix requirements.

sets.name: PRODUCTS
sets.description: Types of products made by the bakery

params.name: chocolate_mix
params.description: Units of chocolate mix required per product

params.name: lemon_mix
params.description: Units of lemon mix required per product

params.name: fiber
params.description: Units of fiber required per product

params.name: chocolate_mix_available
params.description: Total units of chocolate mix available

params.name: lemon_mix_available
params.description: Total units of lemon mix available

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of each product to make

objective.name: min_total_fiber
objective.description: Minimize the total amount of fiber used

constraints.name: chocolate_mix_constraint
constraints.description: Chocolate mix usage must not exceed available supply

constraints.name: lemon_mix_constraint
constraints.description: Lemon mix usage must not exceed available supply

constraints.name: lemon_squares_greater_than_brownies
constraints.description: Number of lemon squares must be greater than the number of brownies

constraints.name: at_least_40_percent_brownies
constraints.description: At least 40% of the items made must be brownies
